doc.title: El Macho Vs. The Canadian Mummies of Mars
doc.plot: In the distant future of the past, an expedition to Mars proves disastrous when hints of an Ancient Canadian civilization are confirmed by the awakening of the terrifying Canadian Mummies. With a horde of parka wearing Undead bent on the destruction of her spacecraft, a beautiful archaeologist must call on the only man strong enough to overcome even the Dead. The only man she's ever loved - He is 'EL MACHO,' a legend of the Masked Mexican Wrestling circuit and giant amongst Super Heroes: A Luchador for The Ages, El Macho must break through the Mummy onslaught and put the hurt on the Mad Scientist behind it all. But watch out El Macho, there's a Double Agent in the mix.
